meanings.definition: A large herbivorous dinosaur with a long neck and small head.
meanings.sent1: The brachiosaurs grazed peacefully in the prehistoric meadow.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the fossils of brachiosaurs to learn about ancient life forms.
meanings.sent3: The brachiosaurs tried to play hide-and-seek, but their long necks always gave them away.
meanings.sent4: In my dream, the brachiosaurs symbolized grace and strength.
meanings.sent5: Children love to imagine the brachiosaurs towering over the trees.

meanings.definition: The brachiosaur was a massive creature that roamed the earth millions of years ago.
meanings.sent1: Visitors at the museum marveled at the skeleton of the brachiosaurs.
meanings.sent2: Many documentaries feature the brachiosaurs as fascinating ancient giants.
meanings.sent3: The brachiosaurs threw a birthday party for the other dinosaurs.
meanings.sent4: The brachiosaurs in the movie seemed to carry the weight of history on their shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The roar of the brachiosaurs echoed through the valley.
